_header: By Thy birth Thou blessed Lord
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 301.
_description: A Song of the Nativity — two six-line stanzas (aabccb; aaabbc) with refrain, ‘Qui hodie natus es nobis’, and four-line burden: ‘Blessed mote ye be swete Ihesus / Qui hodie natus es nobis’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
By thi burthe thou blessed lordYs made of variaunce now on
                    acordeTherfor we may shyng this…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Blessed mote thou be swete jhesusQui hodie natus es
                        nobis
